source.name: Monsters of the Underworld
source.author: Andrew Cawood
source.description:
Cawood Publishing presents the second book in our bestselling Monsters series, Monsters of the Underworld! Stat blocks for 5E, with conversion tables for PF1, PF2, OSE, and DCC. 110 new monsters and lore about the dark realm. From the Lava Dragon to the Lich King, this book will add depth to your game. Featuring the incredible art of Travis Hanson.
Brave the Darkness!
This 129-page full-color book includes:
• Game Master advice • Adventure hooks • 110 new 5E monsters with individual illustrations, stat blocks, and bios • Conversion tables for PF1, PF2, OSE, and DCC • Drow, dwarves, orcs, undead, duergar, deep gnomes, dragons, giants, fiends, elementals, constructs, and more • CRs 1/8 to 30 • Ranger and druid subclasses • Encounter tables • Underworld maps • Lore about the underworld races • Flora • Locations table • Events table
